name: Cactus Planting Simulator
description:
Hi, and welcome to Cactus Planting Simulator!

This game is currently in development, so many things don't work or they aren't finished.

How to play:

Click on the water tap to open it, and drag the watering can under the water flow to fill it up. Then water the pots to start the growth of the cacti. You can use the white bottle to heal rotten cacti, and the green bottle to make the cacti more expensive. The cacti are sold automatically after around 3 days.

Warning: This simulator is just a game, don't use it as a guide!
